Comment: Jointly with the Committee on Governmental Operations

Items.Title: Jointly with the Committee on Governmental Operations

A Local Law to amend the New York city charter and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring written communications regarding the results of inspections from the departments of consumer affairs and health and mental hygiene to be in the receiving business owner’s language of choice
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring written communications regarding the results of inspections from the departments of consumer affairs and health and mental hygiene to be in the receiving business owner’s language of choice.
